title: Senior Java Software Engineer
description:
About Client :\\-
 




  





 Our client is a French multinational information technology (IT) services and consulting company, headquartered in Paris, France. Founded in 1967, It has been a leader in business transformation for over 50 years, leveraging technology to address a wide range of business needs, from strategy and design to managing operations.
 



 The company is committed to unleashing human energy through technology for an inclusive and sustainable future, helping organisations accelerate their transition to a digital and sustainable world.
 



 They provide a variety of services, including consulting, technology, professional, and outsourcing services.
 



  






 Job Details:\\-
 




  





 location : Hyderabad
 



 Mode Of Work : Hybrid
 



 Notice Period : Immediate Joiners
 



 Experience : 8\\-14 yrs
 



 Type Of Hire : Contract to Hire
 



  






 JOB DESCRIPTION:
 




**Senior Java Software Engineer** 




 Euroclear is investing to modernise its applications for running in a cloud\\-ready OpenShift\\-managed Kubernetes container platform.
 



 Our technology is both Mainframe and Java based and uses Event Hub technology (such as Kafka) for integration between the new services and backend systems : We already have a considerable, high quality stack from which we can leverage and grow.
 



 We are seeking an experienced Java Software Engineer to accelerate our Transformation journey.
 







**Responsibilities \\& Duties** 




 Responsibilities include but are not limited to:
 



 ¬∑ Working as part of an Agile development team to deliver new event\\-based and service\\-oriented architecture solution, working in collaboration with the Solution Architect, Technical Lead, application architects and other collaborators.
 



 ¬∑ Lead delivery of a coherent end\\-to\\-end IT solution that meets both functional and non\\-functional requirements.
 



 ¬∑ Ensuring that the IT solution aligns with the Enterprise engineering and architecture standards.
 



 ¬∑ Ensuring end\\-to\\-end consistency of solution delivery across platforms and teams by, for instance, coordinating walkthroughs of the solution with delivery teams.
 



 ¬∑ Ensuring that the solution meets guidelines and standards for design and development.
 



 ¬∑ Undertaking hands\\-on development and mentor staff in the new technologies used.
 



 ¬∑ Mentoring of more junior developers.
 







**Qualifications** 








**Crucial Candidate Traits:** 




 The successful candidate will have proven solutions design and development skills and experience alongside validated strong systems development experience at all stages of the software delivery lifecycle.
 







**Technical Skills:** 




 ¬∑ Strong systems development experience at all stages of systems development covering design, development, testing, live implementation and post implementation support
 



 ¬∑ Strong hands\\-on Object\\-Oriented Design skills
 



 ¬∑ Strong core Java programming skills
 



 ¬∑ Experience of developing services/micro\\-services in Java
 



 ¬∑ Experience of developing containerised services using Docker and Kubernetes
 



 ¬∑ Hands\\-on Spring Boot skills
 



 ¬∑ Experience of developing and deploying on Unix or Linux
 



 ¬∑ Hands\\-on experience of using the Kafka ecosystem
 



 ¬∑ Experience of profiling and performance tuning
 



 ¬∑ Experience of Behaviour\\-Driven and Test\\-Driven development principles and skills
 







**Soft Skills:** 




 ¬∑ Have the ability to empower those you mentor, coach \\& lead!
 



 ¬∑ Be a stand\\-out colleague and role model, willing to participate in peer reviews and to be reviewed by peers
 



 ¬∑ Be reliable, driven and able to work without close management and supervision
 



 ¬∑ Possess encouraging communication and presentation skills to present proposals both orally and in writing
 



 ¬∑ Have the demonstrable ability to complete work within agreed timescales and identify problems and provide the most suitable solution(s)
 







**Desirable Skills:** 




 The following are not essential but would be a plus if the candidate can demonstrate any experience of:
 



 ¬∑ Messaging Standards, for example JSON.
 



 ¬∑ Working in an Agile development team
 



 ¬∑ Designing and implementing platform independent, database independent event driven applications
 



 ¬∑ Database design skills in technologies such as Oracle
 



 ¬∑ Splunk
 



 ¬∑ DevOps' principles, processes and tooling
 



 ¬∑ Working in Financial Market Infrastructure and/or Regulated environments
 



 ¬∑ Affinity with PL1 and IBM Mainframe

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
Job Title: Senior Frontend Engineer (React / Next.js)
 



 Experience: 5\\+ Years
 



 Location: Onsite
 



 Employment Type: Full\\-time
 



  





 About Company
 



 Sparsh Technologies Pvt. Ltd. is a technology\\-driven company focused on building scalable SaaS products and intelligent digital solutions. Our flagship product, HCM Caf√©, is an all\\-in\\-one Human Capital Management platform designed to simplify HR operations, enhance employee experience, and support compliance through automation and data\\-driven insights. We emphasize performance, security, and usability while delivering products that solve real business challenges and scale with growing organizations.
 



  





 About the Role
 



 We are looking for a highly skilled Senior Frontend Engineer with 5\\+ years of hands\\-on experience in building modern, scalable, and high\\-performance web applications.
 



 ¬†The ideal candidate has strong expertise in React, Next.js, TypeScript, and GraphQL, and has worked on large\\-scale frontend systems used by thousands (or more) users.
 



 You will collaborate closely with the teams to deliver high\\-quality user experiences and drive frontend architecture decisions.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities
 


* Design, develop, and maintain large\\-scale frontend applications using React and Next.js
* Build reusable, well\\-structured, and performant UI components
* Work extensively with TypeScript to ensure type safety and maintainable code
* Integrate frontend applications with GraphQL APIs
* Optimize applications for performance, SEO, and accessibility
* Contribute to frontend architecture, design systems, and coding standards
* Review code, mentor junior engineers, and promote best practices
* Collaborate with backend teams on API design and data contracts

* Participate in sprint planning, technical discussions, and production deployments



  





 Required Skills \\& Qualifications
 



 Primary Skills (Must Have)
 


1. 5\\+ years of professional experience in frontend development
2. Strong expertise in React.js
3. Solid hands\\-on experience with Next.js (SSR, SSG, ISR, routing, API routes)
4. Strong proficiency in TypeScript
5. Experience working with GraphQL (queries, mutations, caching, schema understanding)
6. Experience building and maintaining large\\-scale frontend applications
7. Deep understanding of modern JavaScript (ES6\\+)
8. Strong skills in HTML5, CSS3, and modern styling approaches
9. Proficient with VS Code and modern frontend tooling



  





 Secondary / Supporting Skills
 


* Experience with state management libraries (Redux, Zustand, React Query, Apollo Client, etc.)
* Familiarity with frontend performance optimization techniques
* Experience with responsive and mobile\\-first design
* Understanding of browser rendering behavior and web performance metrics
* Experience writing unit and integration tests (Jest, React Testing Library, etc.)
* Familiarity with REST APIs alongside GraphQL
* Experience with Git and modern CI/CD workflows



  





 Nice to Have
 


* Experience with Material UI, Tailwind CSS, or other design systems
* Experience with monorepos or micro\\-frontend architecture
* Knowledge of accessibility standards (WCAG)
* Exposure to cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)
* Experience with monitoring, logging, or analytics tools
* Prior experience in SaaS, enterprise, or high\\-traffic consumer applications



  





 Apply now \\| Be part of our growing tech team.
 



 üì© Send your resume to: chidheka@esparsh.in

title: Test Engineer - Power System Protection
description:
We're improving the way we live and work by intelligently connecting energy systems, buildings, and industries!!
   

  

 Smart infrastructure from Siemens makes the world a more connected and caring place ‚Äì where resources are valued, where impact on the world is considered, where sustainable energy is delivered optimally and efficiently. It provides the flexible infrastructure to allow society to evolve and respond to changing conditions. Technology and the ingenuity of people come together to be at one with our environments and to care for our world. We do this from the macro to the micro level, from physical products, components, and systems to connected, cloud\\-based digital offerings and services. Siemens offers a broad portfolio of grid control and automation; low\\- and medium\\-voltage power distribution, switching and control; and building automation, fire safety and security, HVAC control and energy solutions.
   

  

 JOIN US! WE MAKE REAL WHAT MATTERS. THIS IS YOUR ROLE
   

  

 Test Engineer (Protection System) will be responsible for testing of Control and Relay panels used for various voltage levels in India and Abroad for different applications.
   

  

 The incumbent will be responsible for different project of phases like understanding the client requirement, understanding of project specific documents, preparation of configuration various numerical relays based on approved documents, testing of the same and inspection with customer in factory, support to Project Management/ Engineering/ Commissioning team for smooth execution of the Project.
   

  

**Candidate Profile :**
* Knowledge \\& understanding on various wiring schematic drawings
* Understanding of Power system protection philosophy \\& their application.
* Hands on experience of configuration of various type of Numerical IED‚Äôs (SIEMENS, ABB, GE, Schneider.)
* Hands on experience on various test kits like OMICRON, DOBLE, Megger etc.
* Working experience of integration of Numerical IED‚Äôs with Substation Automation system
* Understanding of client requirement / technical specification
* Basic Knowledge on Substation Automation and Communication Protocols like SNMP, SNTP, Modbus, IEC60870\\-5\\-103, IEC61850, IEC60870\\-5\\-101 and IEC60870\\-5\\-104
* Basic concepts of Digital substation techniques
* Capability to handle customer FAT independently
* Excellent Communication Skills both written and verbal
* Basic/Advance knowledge of MS Excel, MS Word, MS Power Point etc.
* Critical thinking, reasoning and problem solving are an essential part of this position.
* Candidate shall be a good team player, agile, resilient, and sincere
* Enjoy learning new things and build knowledge base in new area.
* Additional expertise in new technology domains like Cyber security, Digitalization trends will be preferred.
* Collaborating for new solutions and technologies required in the business to drive new product and offerings


 WE DON'T NEED SUPERHEROES, JUST SUPER MINDS!
   

  

 WE‚ÄôVE GOT QUITE A LOT TO OFFER. HOW ABOUT YOU?
   

  

 We‚Äôre Siemens. A collection of over 379,000 minds building the future, one day at a time in over 200 countries. We're dedicated to equality and we welcome applications that reflect the diversity of the communities we work in across Gender, LGBTQ\\+, Abilities \\& Ethnicity. All employment decisions at Siemens are based on qualifications, merit and business need. Bring your curiosity and imagination, and help us shape tomorrow.
   

  

 Find out more about Smart Infrastructure at: https://new.siemens.com/global/en/company/topic\\-areas/smart\\-infrastructure.html and about Siemens careers at: www.siemens.com/careers

title: System Test Engineer
description:

 Hewlett Packard Enterprise is the global edge\\-to\\-cloud company advancing the way people live and work. We help companies connect, protect, analyze, and act on their data and applications wherever they live, from edge to cloud, so they can turn insights into outcomes at the speed required to thrive in today‚Äôs complex world. Our culture thrives on finding new and better ways to accelerate what‚Äôs next. We know varied backgrounds are valued and succeed here. We have the flexibility to manage our work and personal needs. We make bold moves, together, and are a force for good. If you are looking to stretch and grow your career our culture will embrace you. Open up opportunities with HPE.
   

  

**Job Description**
***Job Family Definition:***
 System Test Engineer builds from the ground up to meet the needs of mission\\-critical applications, and is always looking for innovative approaches to deliver end\\-to\\-end technical solutions to solve customer problems.
   

  

 Brings technical thinking to break down complex data and to engineer new ideas and methods for solving, prototyping, designing, and implementing cloud\\-based solutions.
   

  

 Collaborates with project managers and development partners to ensure effective and efficient delivery, deployment, operation, monitoring, and support of Cloud engagements.
   

  

 The cloud developer provides business value expertise to drive the development of innovative service offerings that enrich HPE's Cloud Services portfolio across multiple systems, platforms, and applications.
   

  

**Management Level Definition**
 Contributions impact technical components of HPE products, solutions, or services regularly and sustainably. Applies advanced subject matter knowledge to solve complex business issues and is regarded as a subject matter expert. Provides expertise and partnership to functional and technical project teams and may participate in cross\\-functional initiatives. Exercises significant independent judgment to determine best method for achieving objectives. May provide team leadership and mentoring to others.
   

  

**What You'll Do**
* Leads the project team for design and development of complex products and platforms testing, and automation for building efficient, scalable and robust cloud subsystems.
* Reviews and evaluates designs and test plans and develops scripts.
* Provides tangible feedback to improve product quality and mitigate risks.
* Represents the engineering team in various technical forums and provides guidance and mentoring to less\\-experienced team members.
* Drives innovation and integration of new technologies into projects and activities in the software systems design organization.


**What You Need To Bring**
***Education and Experience Required* 
 :**
* Bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, engineering, information systems, or closely related quantitative discipline.
* Typically, 7\\-10 years‚Äô experience.


**Knowledge And Skills**
* Should have strong networking skills and to resolve network issues
* Should have good debugging skills
* Should have good knowledge on Cloud architecture
* Should have worked on building complex customer setups from scratch
* Should have knowledge on Wireless Networking
* Should have hands on knowledge on scripting
* Should have hands on using tools like Ixia, Spirent, Veriwave, Wireshark
* Should have good exposure to Linux architecture
* Should have good communication skills
* Should be good knowledge on writing Test plans, Bugs, Reviewing technical documents
* Should have interest on exploring the tools
* Should be a good team member, self\\-motivated and stretch hands for helping team members
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Ability to effectively communicate product architectures and design proposals at senior management levels.


**Additional Skills**
 Cloud Architectures, Cross Domain Knowledge, Design Thinking, Development Fundamentals, DevOps, Distributed Computing, Microservices Fluency, Full Stack Development, Release Management, Security\\-First Mindset, User Experience (UX)
   

  

**What We Can Offer You**
**Health \\& Wellbeing**
 We strive to provide our team members and their loved ones with a comprehensive suite of benefits that supports their physical, financial and emotional wellbeing.
   

  

**Personal \\& Professional Development**
 We also invest in your career because the better you are, the better we all are. We have specific programs catered to helping you reach any career goals you have ‚Äî whether you want to become a knowledge expert in your field or apply your skills to another division.
   

  

**Unconditional Inclusion**
 We are unconditionally inclusive in the way we work and celebrate individual uniqueness. We know varied backgrounds are valued and succeed here. We have the flexibility to manage our work and personal needs. We make bold moves, together, and are a force for good.

 Job Description
 
**Role Purpose** 




 The purpose of this role is to design, test and maintain software programs for operating systems or applications which needs to be deployed at a client end and ensure its meet 100% quality assurance parameters
 


 Õè

 1\\. Instrumental in understanding the requirements and design of the product/ software
 


* Develop software solutions by studying information needs, studying systems flow, data usage and work processes

* Identify ideas to improve system performance and impact availability
* Analyze client requirements and convert requirements to feasible design

* Develop and automate processes for software validation by setting up and designing test cases/scenarios/usage cases, and executing these cases
* Modifying software to fix errors, adapt it to new hardware, improve its performance, or upgrade interfaces.

* Document and demonstrate solutions by developing documentation, flowcharts, layouts, diagrams, charts, code comments and clear code
* Documenting very necessary details and reports in a formal way for proper understanding of software from client proposal to implementation
* Ensure good quality of interaction with customer w.r.t. e\\-mail content, fault report tracking, voice calls, business etiquette etc
* Timely Response to customer requests and no instances of complaints either internally or externally

 .
 



 ¬†

Of yourself, your career, and your skills. We want to see the constant evolution of our business and our industry. It has always been in our DNA \\- as the world around us changes, so do we. title: ServiceNow Application Developer
description:
**Company Description** 




 At Cogneotech, we are passionate about empowering businesses to unlock the true potential of their data and development teams. We specialize in building advanced solutions across DevOps, Data Engineering, and Machine Learning. As a ServiceNow Developer, you will be a key player in our mission to automate complex business processes and build the "next generation" of service\\-oriented applications for our global clients.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 Cogneotech is seeking a
 **ServiceNow Application/Integration Developer** 
 to lead the technical development of a native ServiceNow integration for one of our key global partners in the Audit, Risk, and Compliance (GRC) space.
 



 In this role, you will act as the bridge between our client‚Äôs proprietary platform and the ServiceNow ecosystem. Your primary mission is to build a robust, scalable application that allows ServiceNow enterprise users to seamlessly sync data, automate audits, and trigger workflows based on external platform events.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 



* Integration Architecture: Design and build bi\\-directional integrations between ServiceNow and an external SaaS platform using REST/SOAP APIs, JSON, and OAuth 2\\.0\\.
* Scoped Application Development: Build and maintain a Scoped Application tailored for the ServiceNow Store, ensuring it meets all "Built on Now" performance and security standards.
* Workflow Orchestration: Utilize IntegrationHub and Flow Designer to create automated "spoke" actions that trigger based on external data inputs.
* Data Mapping \\& Transformation: Develop complex Transform Maps and utilize Robust Data Integration (RDI) to ensure data integrity between systems.
* UX/UI Design: Create intuitive dashboards and workspaces using UI Builder to visualize compliance and audit data directly within ServiceNow.
* Technical Documentation: Author technical design documents, API specifications, and installation guides for end\\-users.



  





**Qualifications** 



* Proficiency in Software Development and Programming. Min 1\\+ YOE.
* Experience working with Databases and ensuring efficient data handling
* Experience with system Integration and other third\\-party tools
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
* Previous experience with ServiceNow development or similar platforms is a plus
* Certified Application Developer certification is preferred.

title: Co-Founder (CTO)
description:
If you're reading this, you're probably not looking for a job. You‚Äôre looking for a mission. A problem worth solving. A product worth building. A role where you can create something from the ground up and know it wouldn‚Äôt exist without you.
 



  





 That‚Äôs exactly what this is.
 



  





 We‚Äôve built the early version of a SaaS platform that‚Äôs already being used by paying customers. It's called Evallo‚Äîand it‚Äôs built for private tutoring and coaching businesses, with a vision to scale across every service provider who charges by the hour. Think education, coaching, consulting, therapy, fitness‚Äîthe long tail of service businesses no one is building infrastructure for.
 



  





 Now, we‚Äôre looking for someone who can take ownership of the entire tech stack and scale it with the same obsession that we‚Äôve brought to the business and product design. This isn‚Äôt a cushy CTO title with a team of engineers waiting for you. It‚Äôs you, your code, your vision, and the real\\-world results we ship together. You will be the reason this product becomes robust, scalable, and beautiful.
 



  





 As the go\\-to technical person from Day 1, you will:
 


* Architect \\& scale a full\\-stack product (MERN stack‚ÄîMongoDB, Express, React, Node.js)
* Ship clean, reliable code fast‚Äîthis isn‚Äôt R\\&D, it‚Äôs a build\\-and\\-deploy environment
* Turn raw ideas into working features‚Äîfrom Figma wireframes to production
* Handle integrations (Google, Zoom, Stripe, etc.) \\& build APIs that support our workflows
* Think about data structures, performance, security, and reliability like it‚Äôs your own product (because it is)



  





 This is a hands\\-on builder role. It‚Äôs not about managing a team‚Äîit‚Äôs about being the engineer who makes the product real.
 



  





**Location** 
 : Remote
 



**Experience** 
 : 5\\+ Years
 



**Industry** 
 : SaaS, EdTech, Service Ops Automation
 



**Stake** 
 : 10\\-15% equity shares (valued between 2\\.8 to 4\\.2 Crores)
 



  





 You‚Äôve probably been a Founder, CTO, or Founding Engineer before. Maybe you‚Äôve exited. Maybe it fizzled. Either way, you know the startup life, and you‚Äôre still in love with it.
 



  





 You should be someone who
 


* Has built and shipped real products (bonus if they were SaaS)
* Understands how to build fast and build right
* Knows tradeoffs and how to make smart bets with limited resources
* Can collaborate with a non\\-technical founder without friction
* Doesn‚Äôt need a roadmap to take initiative‚Äîyou ARE the roadmap



  





**How to Appl** 
 y
 



 Email your cover letter to hr@evallo.ai with:

title: Graphics Designer and Web Developer
description:
**The Company \\-\\-** 




 Castellum Labs is a Next Gen Cyber Security Technology Venture that started in 2018, from Hyderabad, India with global ambitions, to change the cybersecurity service model. The company's vision is to change the cybersecurity value model in the industry. They use SaaS platforms, advanced lab infra in the cloud and a team of specialized experts to deliver long\\-term value. Castellum Labs' primary focus areas in Cyber Security are application security, network and infra security, cloud security, threat detection and response, and Darkweb monitoring and OSINT.
 



  





  




* **We are hiring a graphics designer and web developer, on a full time basis.**
* **For exceptional candidates, we can also do a** 
**consulting contract (part time) basis.**
* **(for Cyber Security Product, Marketing and Sales Activities, Focused on Content Creation).**



  





  





**Role Description** 




 This is a part\\-time hybrid role for a Graphics Designer and a Web Developer at Castellum Labs. As a Graphics Designer and Web Developer, you will be responsible for creating visually appealing designs for various mediums, including digital and print. You will collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to understand design requirements and develop creative solutions. You will be maintaining a web site, with new pages and content publishing on weekly basis. Certain amount of SEO will also need to be done by this role. This role is located in Hyderabad and offers flexibility for some remote work.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities \\-\\-** 



1. Create images, PDFs and creatives for social media posts
2. Create explainer videos for services and products in company's portfolio
3. Maintain company website, with regular updates of content and creatives
4. Create company brochures, service description decks, flyers and sales collateral
5. Support product teams with web designing (UI/UX concepts and graphics)
6. Maintain corporate color themes and schemes for all services \\& products
7. Create content and material for events participation \\& sponsorship
8. Create wireframes for products \\& other tech automations



  





**Qualifications** 



* Proven experience as a Graphics/UI Designer and Web Developer or a similar role
* Proficient in design software, including Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign)
* Strong portfolio showcasing a range of design projects and styles
* Understanding of design principles, composition, and color theory
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills
* Attention to detail and ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously
* Ability to meet deadlines and work in a fast\\-paced environment



  





**Relevant qualification in graphic design or a related field is preferred.** 




**Experience of design of a SaaS platform will be given preference.** 




  





**Location \\- Hyderabad** 




**Joining \\- Immediate** 




**Type \\- Full Time or Part Time** 




  





  





**IMP \\- Person should be willing to learn about IT/Cyber Security domain.** 




  





  





**Four Important Points \\-\\- \\>\\>** 




**A. Please avoid applying, if you are looking for a generic job profile** 




**B. Please also avoid applying, if you are hunting for a salary** 




**C. Avoid applying if you are looking for a designation** 




**D. Don't apply if you are looking for a 9 to 5 job.** 




  





**Please apply within next three days. We will be closing all of these applications within a week.**

title: Master Data Management Developer
description:
**About Client:** 




 Our Client is a global IT services company headquartered in Southborough, Massachusetts, USA. Founded in 1996, with a revenue of $1\\.8B, with 35,000\\+ associates worldwide, specializes in digital engineering, and IT services company helping clients modernize their technology infrastructure, adopt cloud and AI solutions, and accelerate innovation. It partners with major firms in banking, healthcare, telecom, and media.
 



  





 Our Client is known for combining deep industry expertise with agile development practices, enabling scalable and cost\\-effective digital transformation. The company operates in over 50 locations across more than 25 countries, has delivery centers in Asia, Europe, and North America and is backed by Baring Private Equity Asia.
 



  





**Job Title: Master Data Management Developer** 




  





**Location** 
 : Pan India
 



  





**Experience** 
 : 4\\-9 Years
 



  





**Job Typ** 
 e: Contract to Hire
 



  





**Notice Period** 
 : Immediate Joiners
 



  





**Mandatory Skills:** 




  





**MDM Development, Reltio Platform.** 




  





**Job Description:** 




  





 The Master Data Management (MDM) Data Integrations Developer will be part of the Enterprise Architecture \\& Data team and will work closely with Data Governance teams, business partners, application architects and the Data Services team in building and maintaining app\\-to\\-app integrations between MDM product and hub systems. This is a hands\\-on technical role, responsible for design, development, deployment of integration flows connecting any combination of on premises and cloud\\-based processes, services, applications and data across multiple organizations. Top candidates in this role will have excellent business engagement skills, customer service approach, excellent problem\\-solving, solid project management skills, and strong design thinking capabilities in delivering Intelligent Data Integrations, Analytics and Master Data solutions.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Serve as a domain specialist on MDM development and integration needs for Workday's MDM solution. Current IPaaS platform is SnapLogic
* Work closely with solution architects, business analysts, product owners to understand data and business process and work on development activities.
* Identify and analyze business requirements, functional design and translating requirements to technical specifications.
* Architect innovative, framework based, high\\-performance and quality solutions using groundbreaking technologies to cater to the Business needs.
* Develop detailed MDM integration design specifications, develop custom mapping functions and customization to the data tier of MDM Hub.
* Design and develop custom workflows using Java, Python, or other languages.
* Collaborate with several technical teams and business users for Development, QA and operations support.
* Code MDM Integrations, write unit tests and perform code reviews.
* Develop monitoring \\& reporting for the MDM Integration platform.
* Main point of contact for availability and performance issues
* Work closely with cross\\-functional teams such as Infrastructure, Data Services and Data Operations
* Excels in a fast\\-paced, constantly evolving environment.



**Required Qualifications** 



* Bachelor's or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related discipline is required
* 4\\+years of demonstrated ability in MDM development using
 **Reltio Platform** 
 .
* 4\\+years of demonstrated ability in building Data Integrations using
 **Snaplogic Platform** 
 .
* 4\\+years of demonstrated ability in building solutions involving Data Quality, Data architecture and Master Data Management
* At least 4 years of demonstrable experience to develop / customize applications with SOAP / RESTful APIs
* Experience with ETL \\& IPaaS tools such as Workato, MuleSoft, Informatica etc.
* Must have experience with Agile and Integration Solution Development.
* Experience with Data modeling, and Data validation
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills



**Preferred** 



* Experience working on SaaS products.
* Familiarity with Salesforce, Marketo and Workday Systems preferred.
* Experience working with cloud platforms such as AWS, GCP
* Experience implementing Master Data Management domains such as Products, Entitlements, Organization, Person etc.
